T_M2_001.title: Sample Passage - Digital Revolution
T_M2_001.passage: The digital revolution has fundamentally transformed the way we communicate, work, and interact with the world around us. Before the advent of the internet, people relied on traditional methods such as letters and face-to-face meetings to share information. Today, we can instantly connect with anyone across the globe through smartphones and social media platforms. This shift has not only increased the speed of communication but has also created new opportunities for education, business, and entertainment. However, it has also raised concerns about privacy, digital addiction, and the spread of misinformation. As we continue to embrace these technological advances, it becomes crucial to develop digital literacy skills and maintain a healthy balance between our online and offline lives.

T_M2_002.title: Sample Passage - Environmental Protection
T_M2_002.passage: Climate change is one of the most pressing challenges facing our planet today. Scientists have warned that rising global temperatures are causing ice caps to melt, sea levels to rise, and extreme weather events to become more frequent. To address this crisis, many countries have committed to reducing their carbon emissions and transitioning to renewable energy sources. Individual actions also play a crucial role in environmental protection. Simple steps like recycling, using public transportation, and reducing energy consumption at home can make a significant difference. While the task may seem overwhelming, every effort counts in preserving our planet for future generations.
